channel.title: Post on Sam Walsh's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Post on Sam Walsh's Blog

item.title: Rethinking wOBA, xwOBA, xERA, and Stuff+
item.description: I’ve been working on sxwOBA, a baseball statistic that aims to model expected hitting outcomes based on the exit velocity, launch angle, spray direction, and batter sprint speed of a given batted-ball event.

item.title: Markdown Cheat Sheet
item.description: This Markdown cheat sheet provides a quick overview of all the Markdown syntax elements. It canâ€™t cover every edge case, so if you need more information about any of these elements, refer to the reference guides for basic syntax and extended syntax.
